words.translation: Alif Lam Mim

translations.1: Alif-Laaam-Meeem
translations.2: Alifl<u>a</u>mmeem

words.translation: (The) revelation|(of) the Book|(there is) no|doubt|about it|from|(the) Lord|(of) the worlds

translations.1: Tanzeelul Kitaabi laa raiba feehi mir rabbil 'aalameen
translations.2: Tanzeelu alkitabi la rayba feehi min rabbi alAAalameena

words.translation: Or|(do) they say|He invented it|Nay|it|(is) the truth|from|your Lord|that you may warn|a people|not|has come to them|any|warner|before you|before you|so that they may|be guided

translations.1: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu bal huwal haqqu mir rabbika litunzira qawma maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yahtadoon
translations.2: Am yaqooloona iftarahu bal huwa alhaqqu min rabbika litunthira qawman ma atahum min natheerin min qablika laAAallahum yahtadoona

words.translation: Allah|(is) the One Who|created|the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between them|in|six|periods|Then|established Himself|on|the Throne|Not|for you|besides Him|besides Him|any|protector|and not|any intercessor|Then will not|you take heed

translations.1: Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaamin thummas tawaa 'alal 'arsh; maa lakum min doonihee minw waliyyinw wala shafee'; afalaa tatazakkaroon
translations.2: Allahu allathee khalaqa alssamawati waalarda wama baynahuma fee sittati ayyamin thumma istawa AAala alAAarshi ma lakum min doonihi min waliyyin wala shafeeAAin afala tatathakkaroona

words.translation: He regulates|the affair|of|the heaven|to|the earth|then|it will ascend|to Him|in|a Day|(the) measure of which is|(the) measure of which is|a thousand|years|of what|you count

translations.1: Yudabbirul amra minas samaaa'i ilal ardi thumma ya'ruju ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhooo alfa sanatim mimmaa ta'uddoon
translations.2: Yudabbiru alamra mina alssamai ila alardi thumma yaAAruju ilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu alfa sanatin mimma taAAuddoona

words.translation: That|(is the) Knower|(of) the hidden|and the witnessed|the All-Mighty|the Most Merciful

translations.1: Zaalika 'aalimul ghaybi Wa-shahaadatil 'azeezur raheem
translations.2: Thalika AAalimu alghaybi waalshshahadati alAAazeezu alrraheemu

words.translation: The One Who|made good|every|thing|He created|and He began|(the) creation|(of) man|from|clay

translations.1: Allazee ahsana kulla shai-in khalaqa; Wa-bada-a khalqal insaani min teen
translations.2: Allathee ahsana kulla shayin khalaqahu wabadaa khalqa alinsani min teenin

words.translation: Then|He made|his progeny|from|an extract|of|water|despised

translations.1: Thumma ja'ala naslahoo min sulaalatim mim maaa'im maheen
translations.2: Thumma jaAAala naslahu min sulalatin min main maheenin

words.translation: Then|He fashioned him|and breathed|into him|from|His spirit|and made|for you|the hearing|and the sight|and feelings|little|[what]|thanks you give

translations.1: Thumma sawwaahu Wa-nafakha feehi mir roohihih; Wa-ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idah; qaleelam maa tashkuroon
translations.2: Thumma sawwahu wanafakha feehi min roohihi wajaAAala lakumu alssamAAa waalabsara waalafidata qaleelan ma tashkuroona

words.translation: And they say|Is (it) when|we are lost|in|the earth|will we|certainly be in|a creation|new|Nay|they|in (the) meeting|(of) their Lord|(are) disbelievers

translations.1: Wa-qaalooo 'a-izaa dalalnaa fil ardi 'a-innaa lafee khalqin jadeed; bal hum biliqaaa'i rabbihim kaafiroon
translations.2: Waqaloo aitha dalalna fee alardi ainna lafee khalqin jadeedin bal hum biliqai rabbihim kafiroona

words.translation: Say|Will take your soul|(the) Angel|(of) the death|the one who|has been put in charge|of you|Then|to|your Lord|you will be returned

translations.1: Qul yatawaffaakum malakul mawtil lazee wukkila bikum Thumma ilaa rabbikum turja'oon
translations.2: Qul yatawaffakum malaku almawti allathee wukkila bikum thumma ila rabbikum turjaAAoona

words.translation: And if|you (could) see|when|the criminals|(will) hang|their heads|before|their Lord|Our Lord|we have seen|and we have heard|so return us|we will do|righteous (deeds)|Indeed we|(are now) certain

translations.1: Wa-law taraaa izil mujrimoona naakisoo ru'oosihim 'inda rabbihim rabbanaaa absarnaa Wa-sami'naa farji'naa na'mal saalihan innaa mooqinoon
translations.2: Walaw tara ithi almujrimoona nakisoo ruoosihim AAinda rabbihim rabbana absarna wasamiAAna faarjiAAna naAAmal salihan inna mooqinoona

words.translation: And if|We (had) willed|surely We (would) have given|every|soul|its guidance|but|(is) true|the Word|from Me|that I will surely fill|Hell|with|the jinn|and the men|together

translations.1: Wa-law shi'naa la-aatainaa kulla nafsin hudaahaa Wa-laakin haqqal qawlu minnee la-amla'anna jahannama minal jinnati wannaasi ajma'een
translations.2: Walaw shina laatayna kulla nafsin hudaha walakin haqqa alqawlu minnee laamlaanna jahannama mina aljinnati waalnnasi ajmaAAeena

words.translation: So taste|because|you forgot|(the) meeting|(of) this Day of yours|(of) this Day of yours|Indeed, We|have forgotten you|And taste|(the) punishment|(of) eternity|for what|you used (to)|do

translations.1: Fazooqoo bimaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawminkum haaza innaa naseenaakum Wa-zooqoo 'azaabal khuldi bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
translations.2: Fathooqoo bima naseetum liqaa yawmikum hatha inna naseenakum wathooqoo AAathaba alkhuldi bima kuntum taAAmaloona

words.translation: Only|believe|in Our Verses|those who|when|they are reminded|of them|fall down|prostrating|and glorify|(the) praises|(of) their Lord|and they|are not arrogant|are not arrogant

translations.1: Innamaa yu'minu bi-aayaatinal lazeena izaa zukkiroo bihaa kharroo sujjadanw Wa-sabbahoo bihamdi rabbihim Wa-hum laa yastakbiroon
translations.2: Innama yuminu biayatina allatheena itha thukkiroo biha kharroo sujjadan wasabbahoo bihamdi rabbihim wahum la yastakbiroona

words.translation: Forsake|their sides|from|(their) beds|they call|their Lord|(in) fear|and hope|and out of what|We have provided them|they spend

translations.1: Tatajaafaa junoobuhum 'anil madaaji'i yad'oona rabbahum khawfanw Wa-tama'anw Wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon
translations.2: Tatajafa junoobuhum AAani almadajiAAi yadAAoona rabbahum khawfan watamaAAan wamimma razaqnahum yunfiqoona

words.translation: And not|knows|a soul|what|is hidden|for them|of|(the) comfort|(for) the eyes|(as) a reward|for what|they used (to)|do

translations.1: Falaa ta'lamu nafsum maaa ukhfiya lahum min qurrati a'yunin jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
translations.2: Fala taAAlamu nafsun ma okhfiya lahum min qurrati aAAyunin jazaan bima kanoo yaAAmaloona

words.translation: Then is one who|is|a believer|like (him) who|is|defiantly disobedient|Not|they are equal

translations.1: Afaman kaana mu'minan kaman kaana faasiqaa; laa yasta-woon
translations.2: Afaman kana muminan kaman kana fasiqan la yastawoona

words.translation: As for|those who|believe|and do|righteous deeds|then for them|(are) Gardens|(of) Refuge|(as) hospitality|for what|they used (to)|do

translations.1: Ammal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati falahum jannaatul ma'waa nuzulam bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
translations.2: Amma allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati falahum jannatu almawa nuzulan bima kanoo yaAAmaloona

words.translation: But as for|those who|are defiantly disobedient|then their refuge|(is) the Fire|Every time|they wish|to|come out|from it|they (will) be returned|in it|and it (will) be said|to them|Taste|(the) punishment|(of) the Fire|which|you used (to)|[in it]|deny

translations.1: Wa-ammal lazeena fasaqoo fama'waahumun Naaru kullamaaa araadooo any yakhrujoo minhaaa u'eedoo feehaa Wa-qeela lahum zooqoo 'azaaaban Naaril lazee kuntum bihee tukazziboon
translations.2: Waamma allatheena fasaqoo famawahumu alnnaru kullama aradoo an yakhrujoo minha oAAeedoo feeha waqeela lahum thooqoo AAathaba alnnari allathee kuntum bihi tukaththiboona

words.translation: And surely We will let them taste|of|the punishment|the nearer|before|the punishment|the greater|so that they may|return

translations.1: Wa-lanuzeeqan-nahum minal 'azaabil ladnaa doonal 'azaabil akbari la'allahum yarji'oon
translations.2: Walanutheeqannahum mina alAAathabi aladna doona alAAathabi alakbari laAAallahum yarjiAAoona

words.translation: And who|(is) more unjust|than (he) who|is reminded|of (the) Verses|(of) his Lord|then|he turns away|from them|Indeed We|from|the criminals|(will) take retribution

translations.1: Wa-man azlamu mimman zukkira bi-aayaati rabbihee summa a'rada 'anhaa; innaa minal mujrimeena muntaqimoon
translations.2: Waman athlamu mimman thukkira biayati rabbihi thumma aAArada AAanha inna mina almujrimeena muntaqimoona

words.translation: And certainly|We gave|Musa|the Scripture|so (do) not|be|in|doubt|about|receiving it|And We made it|a guide|for the Children|of Israel

translations.1: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba falaa takun fee miryatim mil liqaaa'ihee Wa-ja'alnaahu hudal li-Baneee Israaa'eel
translations.2: Walaqad atayna moosa alkitaba fala takun fee miryatin min liqaihi wajaAAalnahu hudan libanee israeela

words.translation: And We made|from them|leaders|guiding|by Our Command|when|they were patient|and they were|of Our Verses|certain

translations.1: Wa-ja'alnaa minhum a'immataien yahdoona bi-amrinaa lammaa sabaroo Wa-kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa yooqinoon
translations.2: WajaAAalna minhum aimmatan yahdoona biamrina lamma sabaroo wakanoo biayatina yooqinoona

words.translation: Indeed|your Lord|[He]|will judge|between them|(on the) Day|(of) Resurrection|in what|they used (to)|[in it]|differ

translations.1: Inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu bainahum yawmal qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon
translations.2: Inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu baynahum yawma alqiyamati feema kanoo feehi yakhtalifoona

words.translation: Does it not|guide|[for] them|(that) how many|We have destroyed|before them|before them|of|the generations|they walk about|in|their dwellings|Indeed|in|that|surely, are Signs|Then do not|they hear

translations.1: Awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa min qablihim minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatin afalaa yasma'oon
translations.2: Awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna min qablihim mina alqurooni yamshoona fee masakinihim inna fee thalika laayatin afala yasmaAAoona

words.translation: Do not|they see|that We|drive|water|to|the land|[the] barren|then We bring forth|thereby|crops|eat|from it|their cattle|and they themselves|Then do not|they see

translations.1: Awalam yaraw annaa nasooqul maaa'a ilal ardil juruzi fanukhriju bihee zar'an ta'kulu minhu an'aamuhum Wa-anfusuhum afalaa yubsiroon
translations.2: Awalam yaraw anna nasooqu almaa ila alardi aljuruzi fanukhriju bihi zarAAan takulu minhu anAAamuhum waanfusuhum afala yubsiroona

words.translation: And they say|When (will be)|this|decision|if|you are|truthful

translations.1: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal fath-hu in kuntum saadiqeen
translations.2: Wayaqooloona mata hatha alfathu in kuntum sadiqeena

words.translation: Say|(On the) Day|(of) the Decision|not|will benefit|those who|disbelieve|their belief|and not|they|will be granted respite

translations.1: Qul yawmal fath-hi laa yanfa'ul lazeena kafarooo eemaanuhum Wa-laa hum yunzaroon
translations.2: Qul yawma alfathi la yanfaAAu allatheena kafaroo eemanuhum wala hum yuntharoona

words.translation: So turn away|from them|and wait|Indeed they|(are) waiting

translations.1: Fa-a'rid 'anhum wantazir innahum muntaziroon
translations.2: FaaAArid AAanhum waintathir innahum muntathiroona
